item.title: Thousands of dinosaur footprints found on Italian mountain
item.description: The footprints date back some 210 million years and show traces of toes and claws.

item.title: Who are the Bondi shooting victims?
item.description: Authorities say two rabbis, a Holocaust survivor and a 10-year-old girl were among the victims.

item.title: Bondi Beach gunman originally from India, police say
item.description: Sajid Akram had "limited" contact with his family in Hyderabad since moving to Australia 27 years ago, a police official said.

item.title: Sudan's RSF trying to cover up mass killings in el-Fasher, researchers say
item.description: Satellite images show the paramilitary force is burying and burning bodies, Yale University researchers say.

item.title: Ukraine struggling to keep lights on under Russian attack, says energy boss
item.description: DTEK boss Maxim Timchenko says the intensity of Russian strikes is so frequent there is no time to recover.
